.. _`imeta_qu`:

IMETA_QU
========

Perform imeta requests





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_iRODS_imeta:
        output:
            "imeta.txt"
        params:
            extra = "-d",
            kwords = {"projectName": "MetaPRISM", "protocol": "mRNA%"}
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/iRODS/imeta_qu"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* kwords (dict): A dictionary containing {key: value}. Replace "*" by "%" for glob and pattern research
* extra (str): extra parameters for `imeta qu`




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
